name: numlti
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))

stmt.origin: eqbrtri(c0, clt, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(c1, cmul, nat0), caddc, c0))

|- wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))
